channel.title: Media section!
channel.description: this site almost have everything except media editing and award, though i hope we get one cause i like naruto amvs that i make, no porn though -.- that would kill the site right ;), well who wants a media section for video editing? I could be the media editor mod lul. < jk

item.title: Media section!
item.dc:creator: @fellixombc fellixombc
item.description:
@fellixombc wrote:

@fastbawlz
i know how to edit videos…

Read full topic

item.title: Media section!
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

Maybe I’ll make a few tutorials too I’ve been getting into modeling rooms with 3D camera projection

At the moment, I’m trying to learn to track cgi into some footage, but am coming across problems. If you can make a tutorial for that, you’d own.

And I dont really see how this could become a popular board, as 8 in every 10 people here still don’t know how to use photoshop…

Read full topic

meh, i will start posting tutorials tomorrow, unless mopar says no

item.title: Media section!
item.dc:creator: @fellixombc fellixombc
item.description:
@fellixombc wrote:

[quote=“billygotshot, post:4, topic:134595”][quote author=fellixombc link=topic=185994.msg1682843#msg1682843 date=1187410935]

No to the last line otherwise sure.

lul, i could post all the haxes and junk
[/quote]

so? just because you make a topic doesnt mean your going to be the mod of the section… If they decide to make this section they will have it going for a while see who is the most helpful person and make a good decision on the mod.[/quote]
nope, i was joking, l2 read lel?
and i will just use the graphics section for now i guess.
